name: Love.exe
description:
Randie is a love bound cutey bot with a 100,000 horse-power heart.  A heart that strong can be shaken though -- Especially when our precious robotic boy's date is sulking, cold-eyed threat to his health.

  Help poor Randie get his thoughts in order before he gets his love shattered in this future-funky visual novel typing date disaster!

💖💖💖

  All the funkiest of jams that were used in the game can be found here: 🎶 🎶 🎶
